hero.name: Yan Chernyshov
hero.description: Design is not just work — it's art. I create visuals that captivate.

about.title: Who am I?
about.desc1: Hi! My name is Yan, I'm a graphic designer with 4 years of experience. I specialize in graphic design, typography, and creating visually striking compositions.
about.desc2: I constantly improve my skills and strive for excellence in every project. I work effectively both independently and in teams, and I get along well with clients and colleagues.
about.desc3: I bring creative ideas and take responsibility for every task.
about.aiSkills: AI Tools (ChatGpt, DeepSeek, Krea, Stable Diffusion, Adobe Firefly, VEO3, Runway)
about.note: This portfolio contains a selection of my work*
